name: FetchScorecardRules
description:
Fetch all scorecard rules from Datadog.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of all scorecard rules from Datadog's API. This is useful for managing and reviewing rules related to scorecards.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of rules to return per page. Maximum value is 100.

value_schema.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: page_offset
parameters.description: Specific offset to use as the beginning of the returned page for fetching scorecard rules.

value_schema.description: Specific offset to use as the beginning of the returned page.

parameters.name: include_scorecard_details
parameters.description: Specify related scorecard details to include in the response.

value_schema.description: Include related scorecard details in the response.

parameters.name: filter_rule_by_id
parameters.description: Filter the rules based on a specific rule ID.

value_schema.description: Filter the rules on a rule ID.

parameters.name: filter_rules_by_name
parameters.description: Specify a rule name to filter the scorecard rules.

value_schema.description: Filter rules on the rule name.

parameters.name: filter_rule_description
parameters.description: Filter rules based on their description. Provide a string to match against the rule descriptions.

value_schema.description: Filter rules on the rule description.

parameters.name: specific_rule_fields
parameters.description: Specify which rule fields to include in the response. Provide a comma-separated list of field names.

value_schema.description: Return only specific fields in the response for rule attributes.

parameters.name: specific_scorecard_fields
parameters.description: Specify which fields to include in the response for scorecard attributes. Use comma-separated values.

value_schema.description: Return only specific fields in the included response for scorecard attributes.

parameters.name: filter_for_enabled_rules
parameters.description: Set to true to filter for enabled rules only.

value_schema.description: Filter for enabled rules only.

parameters.name: filter_custom_rules_only
parameters.description: Set to true to include only custom rules in the results.

value_schema.description: Filter for custom rules only.
